name: Mecha Mechanic (MlekonCZ)
description:
Controls:
wasd - movement
E - interaction

In this game you are owning a mech store where people come to buy mechs.
You have 7 days to get enough money to repay your loan.


Game is programmed by me. 
And Voxel light studios made music for game.

Additional info: This is only prototype so there will be later lot of changes. Iam planning to continue working on this game so if you have any ideas feel free to say then in comment I will be glad for every feedback.
